divs: Sighting Details1. I am requesting that my identification not be published or shared the affectof this will have a negative impact of my place of employment.2. My mother and I now deceased while driving 99 N towards Atwater, CA.3. My mother pointed at a falling star bright, appeared to be on fire, brightwhite light to orange.4. falling star decended at a rapid speed at a 45 degree angle5. falling star stopped and fell at a 90 degree angle6. falling star stopped and changed direction descending to a 45 degree angle.7. I perceived that this even would be noticeable to everyone but was notpublished in the local newspaper.8. Note I have left out many details, but do not ask me to explain, this is ageneral description. Good luck and God Bless...NOTHING FOLLOWS
